messages.message: Howdy hey everyone :wave:  I am looking to solicit feedback from developers who have opinions around building the base sandbox environment for this PR (https://github.com/instabase/instabase/pull/68143) -- it includes changes to build the base image/snapshot as a docker image, rather than leveraging Ansible (as is currently done)! (cc <!subteam^S08AA13VAFQ>, @mfichman)
platform/crafting/docker/docker-bake.hcl is the meat of it, right? Melds the different images into one?
yep you got it! `ibdev.Dockerfile` is the "final" image where everything gets combined and exported
I say go for it if it works! Great to not have to spin up a sandbox to build the base image.
I know I’ve knocked bakefiles before since they were beta (are they still beta?) but this is a non-prod-critical system, so I figure it’s OK.
yep it was GA'd earlier this month (https://www.docker.com/blog/ga-launch-docker-bake/) :smile:
Oh nice. No reservations at all then!

sweet! I'll update the ibdev and/or frontend templates to use this initially so I don't accidentally screw up the majority of people's environments :sweat_smile: assuming that sits well I'll ping you with an update to the ibdev-backend template once it's ready, thank you sir!
Ship it! Can you do the backend template too? Updating the sandbox is opt-in, so shouldn’t disrupt most people if there is a problem.
If you're cool with it then for sure!
Yes, thank you! I’ll try it out on a new sandbox  after it merges.
mind giving it another look once you have a moment? just pushed the updates to the template :slightly_smiling_face:
